desc: Eco-friendly, compostable and biodegradable bamboo toothbrushes. Making a chancge to the environmet is now easier than ever. We have bamboo toothbrushes with the option of buying a single 1 or a full pack of 6 which is enough for a year;s use!

Sustainable Bamboo Products
VEGAN | PLASTIC-FREE | BIODEGRADABLE
